#include <iostream>
#include "bits/stdc++.h"
using namespace std;
int main() {
     int n,m,h,sum=0,s1,s;
     cin>>n>>m>>h;
     for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
     {
        cin>>s;
         if(i==h)
            s1=s;
          sum+=s;
     }
     if(sum<n)
      {
        cout<<-1<<endl; return 0;
      }
     if(s1<2)
     {
        cout<<0<<endl; return 0;
     }
    n--;s1--;sum--;
      double p=1.0;
     for(int i=0; i<s1; ++i) p *= (double)(sum - n - i)/(double)(sum - i);
 
        printf("%.7lf\n", 1.0 - p);
    return 0;
}
